item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Well, the story isn’t as great as the main game (it’s still good though), but if you love Vice City and want it to be mixed with how awesome GTA4 was, you’ll be grinning, smiling, and even laughing for the entire ride!

You have not lived until you flew a golden rocket launching helicopter and started blowing shit up in Free Mode, followed by an epic parachute bailout.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

His lost.

The Ballad of Gay Tony is amazing and the more people play it the better.

From what I’ve seen, I’m guessing it’ll be my least favorite- but that’s not saying much, they’re all still great.

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
saivert:

oh funny you Acristoff.

I don’t care about this really. Timed exclusives just ruin everything. Now I have been force fed news and videos about the GTA IV DLC/expansions for too long. I’m just fed up with it. Guess that is my fault for watching Gametrailers and shit.

Rockstar = dead to me.

Your loss.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: Acristoff
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

…or it’s the perfect time for PS3 and PC fanboys to get revenge for all the shit they had to put up with by 360 fanboys since the DLC was announced to be “exclusive” to the 360.

God I hate the comments section of gaming websites/YouTube.

That’s why you don’t go there. You go here for civilized discussion with intelligent people with thought out and formulated opinions.

lolsarcasm

Read full topic

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

And so ends yet another fanboy penis sword fight. It’s been a long time coming, but everyone can just settle down and relax. It’s times like these when people should realize that, it doesn’t matter if you’re playing XBox 360, PS3, or the PC as your platform of choice. What matters is that we’re all gamers and we all love great games.

…or it’s the perfect time for PS3 and PC fanboys to get revenge for all the shit they had to put up with by 360 fanboys since the DLC was announced to be “exclusive” to the 360.

God I hate the comments section of gaming websites/YouTube.

YouTube… :fffuuu:

Well, I’m proud of Rockstar… It’s about damn time.

Read full topic

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: The_can
item.description:
Deutscher Scharfschütze:

the contract probably expired.

EDIT: or the contract agreed that after the majority of 360 sales occurred, then it could be ported to other platforms.

I just hope they Path the fuck out of GTA IV on the PC, using a custom anti-aliasing really puts a strain on my PC.

Custom AA? So you’re using the downsampling thing from the ENB series mod? It would be awesome if they added anti aliasing but that’s very unlikely…

Read full topic

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: taxi_evil
item.description:
Completed TLAD last night, so awesome

I’m also glad they’re coming out on PS3 and PC. I only really play games on the xbox, but I’ve never held it against anyone who chooses differently. We’re all gamers after all, better off providing some collective rage to places like the Daily Mail that want GTA4 banned and princess diana resurrected

item.title: GTA4: Episodes coming to pc
item.dc:creator: Level
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Wait a second?! They’re coming the the PS3 as well?!
I could understand the PC, because GTAIV PC requires Games for Windows, but the PS3?!
So much for Microsoft’s $50 million.

It’s another market that it will set a lot of units on…

Read full topic
